sources.title: Stage Krazy (1933)
sources.description: A variety show. Krazy Kat plays 12th Street Rag. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/stage-krazy-1933/

metadata.Plot: With an all-animal audience and all animal performers, it's a variety show of (bad) singers, eccentric dancers, gymnasts and piano playing.There's a nice, fluid piano version of "12 Street Rag", supposedly played by Krazy Kat, and that makes it an OK cartoon by me; it's a song that's always fun and impossible to ruin. Your taste may vary, of course; you may never have even heard of the tune. Perhaps, then, you'll enjoy the brief shot of Mickey Mouse in the audience.
metadata.Director: Manny Gould, Ben Harrison, Harry Love
